text: â€œAllah ndi Yemwe adatukula thambo popanda mizati imene mukuiona; kenako adakhazikika pa Arsh (Mpando Wachifumu Waukulu, kukhazikika koyenera ndi Iye komwe kulibe chofanizira); ndipo adafewetsa dzuwa ndi mwezi (kwa anthu). Chilichonse mwa zimenezi chikupitilira kuyenda mpaka nyengo imene idaikidwa. Iye ndi Yemwe akuyendetsa zinthu; akulongosola Ayah (ndime) kuti mukhale ndi chitsimikizo pa zakukumana ndi Mbuye wanu
